Here's a comprehensive overview of the rooms and amenities available at Jetwing Beach. Jetwing Beach offers 78 luxurious rooms and suites designed to blend modern comforts with Sri Lankan hospitality and stunning ocean views. Jetwing Beach in Negombo is a perfect blend of luxury, relaxation, and warm Sri Lankan hospitality. With its stunning beachfront location, range of dining options, wellness services, and activities, it offers a memorable experience for guests looking to relax by the Indian Ocean, explore Sri Lanka’s rich culture, or simply enjoy a luxurious beach getaway.

rooms.description: Jetwing Beach offers 78 luxurious rooms and suites designed to blend modern comforts with Sri Lankan hospitality and stunning ocean views. The suites offer the most luxurious accommodation at Jetwing Beach with separate living and dining areas. Jetwing Beach provides a variety of world-class amenities and facilities to ensure guests have a comfortable and memorable stay.

name: Jetwing Sea
details: Jetwing Sea is a stylish beachfront hotel located in Negombo, Sri Lanka, offering a serene coastal retreat. As part of the Jetwing Hotels chain, it combines modern comforts with traditional Sri Lankan hospitality. This property is ideal for both leisure and business travelers, with its focus on providing a peaceful escape along the shores of the Indian Ocean. Jetwing Sea in Negombo offers a blend of relaxed luxury, Sri Lankan hospitality, and oceanfront beauty. With its comfortable rooms, gourmet dining options, and wellness-focused facilities, the hotel is ideal for those seeking both a beachside escape and a convenient location near Colombo. Whether you're interested in indulging in Ayurvedic spa treatments, enjoying water sports, or exploring the cultural richness of Negombo, Jetwing Sea provides a serene and luxurious base for your Sri Lankan getaway.

rooms.description: Jetwing Sea offers 83 well-appointed rooms and suites designed for comfort, relaxation, and scenic views of the ocean. Jetwing Sea offers a variety of dining experiences, focusing on fresh, local ingredients and ocean-inspired flavors. Jetwing Sea is designed to offer a comfortable, relaxing stay with a variety of facilities that cater to leisure and wellness.

name: Jetwing Lagoon
details: Jetwing Lagoon is a luxury resort located in Negombo, Sri Lanka, and is known for its serene setting between the Negombo Lagoon and the Indian Ocean. Situated on the west coast of Sri Lanka, Negombo is a popular tourist destination known for its beaches, Dutch-era buildings, and vibrant culture. Between the Lagoon and the Ocean: Jetwing Lagoon is uniquely positioned between the tranquil waters of the Negombo Lagoon and the Indian Ocean, offering picturesque views of both.

rooms.description: The resort is designed by renowned Sri Lankan architect Geoffrey Bawa, who is celebrated for pioneering 'tropical modernism'. The minimalist design of Jetwing Lagoon is inspired by local materials and natural surroundings, blending traditional aesthetics with modern luxury. The resort boasts one of the largest swimming pools in Sri Lanka, measuring about 100 meters, offering guests a stunning view while they swim. The resort features luxurious rooms and suites, each offering modern amenities and a tranquil environment. Rooms typically provide views of the lagoon or the garden. Jetwing Lagoon is ideal for travelers seeking relaxation, luxury, and a close connection with nature in Sri Lanka.

name: Hotel J Negombo
details: Hotel J Negombo is a budget-friendly hotel located in the coastal town of Negombo, Sri Lanka. It is part of the Jetwing group, a well-known hospitality brand in Sri Lanka, but focuses on providing affordable, comfortable accommodation for travelers. Hotel J is conveniently located near the Negombo beach, making it an ideal spot for travelers looking to enjoy the sun, sea, and sand. The hotel is just a 20-minute drive from the Bandaranaike International Airport (CMB), making it an accessible option for travelers arriving in or leaving Sri Lanka. Hotel J offers clean, modern, and minimalist rooms. Rooms are designed to be functional and comfortable, perfect for travelers on a budget who still want a good quality stay. In summary, Hotel J in Negombo is an ideal choice for travelers looking for a cost-effective stay with access to both the beach and the city’s amenities, while still enjoying the comforts of a well-maintained property.

rooms.description: Overlooking the ocean, offering a relaxing experience with comfortable sun loungers around the pool area. Ideal for both lounging and casual swimming. Offers a mix of local Sri Lankan cuisine and international dishes. You can expect options like fresh seafood, traditional curries, and Western-style meals. Meals are served à la carte or buffet-style depending on guest preferences and occupancy. Hotel J Negombo offers a clean, comfortable, and budget-friendly environment. While it focuses on simplicity, the hotel provides key amenities like a pool, beach access, and friendly service, making it ideal for budget-conscious travelers who want a good location near the beach and airport.

name: Heritance Kandalama
details: Heritance Kandalama is a luxurious eco-friendly hotel located near Dambulla, Sri Lanka, renowned for its unique design and harmonious integration with nature. The hotel is set in a picturesque setting, nestled between the lush jungles and overlooking the Kandalama Lake and the surrounding mountains.

rooms.description: Designed by renowned Sri Lankan architect Geoffrey Bawa, the hotel is considered a masterpiece of tropical modernism and sustainable architecture. The hotel has received international acclaim for its environmentally conscious design. It operates with a strong focus on sustainability, featuring waste management systems, water conservation practices, and an energy-efficient structure. Heritance Kandalama is a perfect destination for travelers seeking both luxury and a deep connection with nature, making it a leading eco-resort in Sri Lanka.

name: Ahungalla Heritance
details: Heritance Ahungalla is a luxury beachfront resort located on the southern coast of Sri Lanka, in the town of Ahungalla, known for its pristine beaches and stunning ocean views. The hotel combines elegant design, modern amenities, and a strong commitment to sustainability, making it a premier destination for travelers seeking both relaxation and luxury.

rooms.description: The resort is situated on a stunning stretch of golden sand beach, offering guests direct access to the Indian Ocean and a serene tropical environment. The resort offers a variety of luxury rooms and suites, most with private balconies or terraces offering views of the ocean or landscaped gardens. One of the highlights of the resort is its large infinity pool, which seems to merge with the horizon, offering stunning ocean views. The pool area is surrounded by comfortable lounge chairs and shaded areas. Heritance Ahungalla provides a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and natural beauty. With its exceptional dining, modern amenities, wellness options, and eco-conscious philosophy, it is a top destination for both relaxation and adventure in Sri Lanka.

name: Hotel RIU Sri Lanka
details: Hotel Riu Sri Lanka is a luxurious, all-inclusive beachfront resort located in Ahungalla, on Sri Lanka’s southwestern coast. It is part of the RIU Hotels & Resorts chain, known for providing high-quality service and comprehensive amenities for guests seeking relaxation and entertainment in an exotic location. The hotel is located directly on Ahungalla Beach, offering easy access to the golden sands and clear waters of the Indian Ocean. The resort is surrounded by tropical landscapes, and its beachfront location provides stunning sea views and the opportunity to enjoy the natural beauty of Sri Lanka’s coast.

rooms.description: The hotel has 501 rooms, ranging from standard rooms to larger suites, all designed with modern decor and comfort in mind. Serves buffet-style international cuisine with live cooking stations for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The restaurant offers a variety of options, including local Sri Lankan dishes. The resort has three outdoor pools, including a large infinity pool overlooking the beach, a pool with a swim-up bar, and a separate children’s pool. Hotel RIU Sri Lanka is a top choice for travelers looking for a comprehensive, all-inclusive experience in Sri Lanka.

name: Grand Tamarind Lake
details: Grand Tamarind Lake is a luxury resort located near the Tissamaharama Lake in the southern region of Sri Lanka. This scenic and tranquil location provides stunning views of the lake and its surrounding lush greenery, making it a perfect destination for nature lovers, couples, and families seeking relaxation. The resort offers modern amenities and excellent service while maintaining a peaceful atmosphere for its guests.

rooms.description: The resort is situated near the beautiful Tissamaharama Lake, offering guests spectacular views of the lake and surrounding landscapes. It is an ideal base for exploring nearby natural attractions such as Yala National Park, Bundala National Park, and Kataragama, one of Sri Lanka's most sacred pilgrimage sites. The hotel has a beautiful infinity pool overlooking the lake, allowing guests to relax and cool off while taking in the serene views. The pool area is equipped with sun loungers and umbrellas for guests who prefer to relax by the water. Grand Tamarind Lake offers a tranquil and luxurious experience with a strong connection to nature. The combination of lakeside views, luxurious accommodations, excellent dining, and access to wildlife and cultural sites makes it a perfect destination for both relaxation and adventure in southern Sri Lanka.

name: Mandara Rosen Kataragama
details: Mandara Rosen Kataragama is a stylish 4-star hotel located in Kataragama, Sri Lanka, a town famous for its religious significance and close proximity to wildlife parks. The hotel offers a blend of modern luxury and traditional charm, providing a serene retreat for travelers visiting the sacred town or exploring the nearby natural attractions.

rooms.description: The hotel is located just a few minutes from the Kataragama Temple, a major pilgrimage site for Buddhists, Hindus, and Muslims. This makes it an ideal location for guests visiting for religious or spiritual purposes. Mandara Rosen is also near popular wildlife parks, such as Yala National Park and Udawalawe National Park, making it a great base for wildlife safaris. Mandara Rosen features a large outdoor swimming pool, which is one of the largest in the Kataragama area. Mandara Rosen Kataragama offers a unique combination of spiritual, natural, and luxurious experiences. With its proximity to the Kataragama Temple and national parks, it serves as an ideal location for both religious visitors and adventure seekers.

name: Hotel Sudu Araliya
details: Hotel Sudu Araliya is a well-known hotel located in Polonnaruwa, a UNESCO World Heritage site in Sri Lanka. The hotel is situated near the beautiful Parakrama Samudraya (Sea of Parakrama), offering stunning views of the vast ancient reservoir and easy access to the rich historical and cultural landmarks of Polonnaruwa. The hotel is located on the banks of the Parakrama Samudraya, one of the largest ancient irrigation reservoirs in Sri Lanka, offering peaceful views and a serene atmosphere.

rooms.description: The hotel offers a variety of rooms and suites, all designed to provide comfort and a blend of modern and traditional aesthetics. Hotel Sudu Araliya features a large outdoor swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers and parasols. The pool area offers beautiful views of the lake and is perfect for relaxation after a day of sightseeing. Hotel Sudu Araliya offers a combination of modern comforts and close proximity to Sri Lanka’s rich cultural heritage, particularly the ancient city of Polonnaruwa. With its beautiful lakeside setting, large pool, wellness options, and accessibility to wildlife and historical excursions, it provides a serene and enriching experience for both leisure and business travelers alike.

name: EKHO Lake House
details: EKHO Lake House Polonnaruwa is a luxury boutique hotel located on the shores of the ancient Parakrama Samudraya (Sea of Parakrama) in Polonnaruwa, Sri Lanka. Known for its rich historical significance and tranquil setting, the hotel offers a blend of modern luxury with historical charm, making it an ideal destination for travelers looking to explore the ancient city of Polonnaruwa or enjoy a peaceful retreat by the lake.

rooms.description: The hotel is situated right on the banks of the Parakrama Samudraya, offering stunning views of the lake, with its calm waters creating a peaceful and serene atmosphere. EKHO Lake House features a lovely outdoor swimming pool, overlooking the lake. The pool area is equipped with sun loungers and umbrellas, offering a peaceful spot to relax and enjoy the surroundings. EKHO Lake House Polonnaruwa offers a luxurious and peaceful retreat in one of Sri Lanka’s most historically significant locations. The combination of its stunning lakefront setting, proximity to ancient ruins, and elegant accommodations makes it a perfect choice for travelers looking to immerse themselves in Sri Lanka’s rich cultural heritage while enjoying modern comforts.

name: W15 Weligama
details: W15 Weligama is a stylish beachfront boutique hotel located in Weligama, on Sri Lanka’s south coast. Known for its chic design and laid-back ambiance, W15 offers a blend of luxury and relaxation, making it a popular choice for travelers seeking a beachside escape. The hotel is especially popular among surfers due to its proximity to Weligama’s famous surf spots. W15 is located directly on Weligama Beach, a long sandy beach known for its safe and consistent surf, especially ideal for beginners.

rooms.description: W15 Weligama offers luxury rooms with contemporary décor, blending minimalist design with comfort. The rooms are designed with a light, airy feel that complements the beachside location. The hotel’s main restaurant offers a fusion of local Sri Lankan and international cuisine. The menu emphasizes fresh, seasonal ingredients, especially seafood, sourced from the nearby waters. W15 Weligama has a stylish outdoor infinity pool that overlooks the beach. Surrounded by sun loungers and shaded areas, the pool provides a perfect spot to relax and enjoy the beachfront views. W15 Weligama offers a chic, relaxing retreat on one of Sri Lanka’s most famous beaches. With its luxurious accommodations, beachfront dining, and prime location for surfing and other water sports, it caters to both adventure seekers and those looking for a peaceful getaway.

name: EKHO Weligama
details: EKHO Weligama is a charming boutique hotel located in Weligama, a laid-back coastal town on Sri Lanka’s southern coast, known for its beautiful beaches and excellent surf spots. EKHO Weligama offers a mix of comfort and personalized service, making it a great option for travelers looking to relax by the beach while enjoying modern amenities and local experiences.

rooms.description: EKHO Weligama is located near Weligama Beach, a popular destination for both surfers and beach lovers. The hotel is ideally situated for easy access to the town’s surf spots, beachside activities, and nearby attractions like Mirissa and Galle. EKHO Weligama offers stylish and comfortable rooms designed with modern decor, ensuring a relaxing environment for guests. The hotel featurEKHO Weligama is a stylish yet laid-back boutique hotel perfect for travelers seeking a beachside retreat with modern amenities. The hotel’s beachfront location, easy access to surfing and water sports, and proximity to key attractions like Mirissa and Galle Fort make it an excellent choice for both adventure and relaxationes an outdoor swimming pool, providing guests with an alternative to the beach.

name: Mermaid Hotel & Club
details: Mermaid Hotel & Club is a charming beachfront hotel located in Negombo, Sri Lanka, known for its welcoming atmosphere, lush gardens, and excellent service. Situated along the stunning Negombo Beach, this hotel provides guests with a tranquil retreat ideal for relaxation and exploration of the beautiful coastal area. The hotel is located directly on Negombo Beach, offering guests easy access to the sandy shores and beautiful sunsets.

rooms.description: The hotel offers a variety of accommodations, including Standard Rooms, Superior Rooms, Family Rooms, and Suites. Each room is designed for comfort and relaxation, featuring a blend of modern and traditional decor. The hotel features a restaurant that serves a selection of local and international cuisine, focusing on fresh seafood and Sri Lankan specialties. Guests can enjoy meals in a beautiful setting overlooking the ocean. Mermaid Hotel & Club has a large outdoor swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers, making it an ideal spot for relaxation and enjoying the tropical sun. Whether lounging by the pool, savoring delicious cuisine, or exploring the vibrant marine life, visitors will find a memorable experience at Mermaid Hotel & Club.

name: Amaranthé Bay Resort & Spa
details: Amaranthé Bay Resort & Spa is a luxury boutique resort located in Uppuveli, Trincomalee, on the northeastern coast of Sri Lanka. Known for its tranquil setting, close proximity to pristine beaches, and a focus on relaxation and wellness, Amaranthé Bay offers a peaceful retreat with modern amenities and easy access to the region’s natural beauty and cultural attractions.

rooms.description: Amaranthé Bay Resort & Spa offers a perfect balance of luxury, relaxation, and adventure. With its upscale accommodations, exceptional dining, and wellness facilities, guests can enjoy a peaceful escape while having access to thrilling activities like diving, whale watching, and exploring Trincomalee’s rich history and natural beauty. Whether you’re seeking a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a wellness retreat, Amaranthé Bay provides a serene and luxurious environment for all travelers.

name: 98 Acres Resort & Spa
details: 98 Acres Resort & Spa is a luxurious boutique hotel nestled in the scenic hills of Ella, Sri Lanka. This resort is famous for its stunning views of the surrounding tea plantations, lush greenery, and iconic natural landmarks like Little Adam’s Peak. Situated in the heart of Sri Lanka's tea country, in Ella, known for its spectacular landscapes and mild climate.

rooms.description: Offers panoramic vistas of misty mountains, tea plantations, and nearby attractions such as Little Adam’s Peak, which is a short hike away. The resort is built on a 98-acre tea estate, and the rooms, or chalets, are designed using eco-friendly materials like recycled wood and railway sleepers. They offer modern amenities while maintaining a rustic and natural ambiance. The resort is designed to blend with its natural surroundings and uses sustainable practices such as energy-efficient architecture and eco-friendly materials.

name: Cinnamon Bentota Beach
details: Cinnamon Bentota Beach is a luxurious, heritage-inspired beachfront resort located in Bentota, a picturesque coastal town on Sri Lanka’s southwest coast. Managed by the Cinnamon Hotels & Resorts group, it is one of the most iconic properties in the country, known for its stunning architecture, rich history, and prime location between the Bentota River and the Indian Ocean. The resort provides a perfect blend of beach relaxation, luxury, and outdoor adventure.

rooms.description: The resort is beautifully positioned on a strip of land between the Indian Ocean and the Bentota River, offering both beach and riverside views. Bentota is approximately a 90-minute drive from Colombo, making it easily accessible for travelers. The resort offers a variety of room types, including Deluxe Rooms, Superior Rooms, and Luxury Suites, all with sea, river, or garden views. Cinnamon Bentota Beach is a sophisticated blend of luxury, culture, and nature, making it one of the premier destinations on Sri Lanka’s southwestern coast for relaxation, exploration, and adventure.

name: Jetwing Saman Villas
details: Jetwing Saman Villas is an exclusive luxury boutique hotel located in Bentota, along Sri Lanka’s stunning southwest coastline. This resort is known for offering a secluded, tranquil escape for discerning travelers looking for privacy, breathtaking ocean views, and personalized service. Jetwing Saman Villas is perched on a cliff, giving guests sweeping views of the Indian Ocean on one side and the lush tropical landscape on the other.

rooms.description: Jetwing Saman Villas is located in Aturuwella, near Bentota, which is around a two-hour drive from Colombo and about 90 minutes from the Bandaranaike International Airport. Its unique location on a rocky promontory between two golden sandy beaches ensures a high level of privacy and unparalleled sea views. Jetwing Saman Villas is designed exclusively with suites, offering spacious and luxurious accommodations, most of which are sea-facing and come with private balconies or terraces. The rooms are elegantly furnished with a fusion of modern and traditional Sri Lankan aesthetics. Jetwing Saman Villas is renowned for its unmatched elegance, exclusivity, and serene atmosphere, making it one of the premier luxury resorts in Sri Lanka.

name: EKHO Surf Bentota
details: EKHO Surf Bentota is a vibrant beachfront resort located along the golden sands of Bentota Beach, one of Sri Lanka’s most popular coastal destinations. Known for its casual elegance and prime location, the resort offers a perfect blend of comfort, relaxation, and activities for families, couples, and adventure seekers alike. With panoramic ocean views and direct access to the beach, EKHO Surf is a great option for travelers looking to experience the beauty of Sri Lanka’s southwest coast. Situated on Bentota Beach, about a 90-minute drive south of Colombo and roughly two hours from Bandaranaike International Airport, EKHO Surf is easily accessible while still offering a peaceful, beachfront retreat.

rooms.description: The resort has a variety of room options, including Deluxe Ocean View Rooms and Superior Ocean View Rooms. EKHO Surf Bentota is a well-rounded resort that caters to various types of travelers, from families to couples and adventure seekers. With its beautiful beach location, comfortable accommodations, and a wide range of activities, it offers a memorable Sri Lankan vacation experience in the heart of the southwest coast.

name: Sigiriya Jungles
details: Sigiriya Jungles is a stunning eco-lodge situated near the iconic Sigiriya Rock Fortress in Sri Lanka. Nestled within a lush, natural environment, the lodge provides guests with an immersive experience in nature, combining luxury accommodations with sustainable tourism practices. The setting is perfect for travelers looking to explore the Cultural Triangle, witness wildlife, and enjoy the tranquility of the Sri Lankan countryside.

rooms.description: Sigiriya Jungles is located about 1.5 kilometers from Sigiriya Rock Fortress, making it an ideal base for visiting this UNESCO World Heritage Site. The lodge is approximately a 4-hour drive from Colombo and Bandaranaike International Airport. Sigiriya Jungles offers a unique blend of luxury, nature, and cultural experiences in the heart of Sri Lanka's Cultural Triangle. With its eco-friendly focus, comfortable accommodations, and proximity to historical attractions, the lodge provides guests with an unforgettable experience of Sri Lanka's natural and cultural heritage. Whether you’re exploring Sigiriya Rock, going on a wildlife safari, or simply relaxing in the lush surroundings, Sigiriya Jungles ensures a memorable stay that connects you with the beauty of nature.

name: 8+ Plus Motels
details: 8+ Plus Motels is a chain of motels located in Sri Lanka, known for offering budget-friendly accommodations with essential amenities and a focus on comfort and convenience. The motels cater to a variety of travelers, including families, backpackers, and those looking for affordable lodging while exploring different parts of the country.

rooms.description: 8+ Plus Motels are strategically located in key tourist areas across Sri Lanka, making them accessible for travelers looking to explore popular destinations. 8+ Plus Motels typically offer a range of room types to accommodate different budgets and preferences. 8+ Plus Motels offer a practical solution for travelers looking for budget-friendly accommodations in Sri Lanka. With their focus on comfort, essential amenities, and strategic locations, they provide a convenient base for exploring the rich cultural and natural heritage of the country. Whether you're visiting bustling cities, ancient ruins, or serene landscapes, 8+ Plus Motels can be a suitable choice for your stay in Sri Lanka.

name: Sentido Heritance Negombo
details: Sentido Heritance Negombo is a luxurious beachfront resort located in Negombo, Sri Lanka. Known for its modern design, upscale amenities, and proximity to both the beach and local attractions, it is a popular choice for travelers looking for a relaxing getaway with a touch of elegance. Sentido Heritance is situated along the beautiful coastline of Negombo, which is approximately 12 kilometers (about 7.5 miles) from Bandaranaike International Airport. This makes it a convenient choice for travelers seeking a beach destination close to the airport.

rooms.description: Sentido Heritance is situated along the beautiful coastline of Negombo, which is approximately 12 kilometers (about 7.5 miles) from Bandaranaike International Airport. This makes it a convenient choice for travelers seeking a beach destination close to the airport. Sentido Heritance Negombo offers a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and cultural experiences along the beautiful coastline of Sri Lanka. With its upscale amenities, beachfront location, and variety of activities, the resort is an ideal destination for couples, families, and business travelers seeking a memorable getaway in Negombo. Whether you’re lounging by the pool, indulging in spa treatments, or exploring the local culture, Sentido Heritance ensures a relaxing and enriching experience.

name: The Kingsbury Colombo
details: The Kingsbury Colombo is a prestigious luxury hotel located in the heart of Colombo, Sri Lanka. Known for its elegance and world-class amenities, The Kingsbury offers a sophisticated atmosphere with stunning views of the Indian Ocean and the bustling city skyline. It caters to both business and leisure travelers, providing a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and luxury.

rooms.description: The Kingsbury Colombo is a premier luxury hotel that offers an exceptional experience for travelers seeking comfort, elegance, and convenience in Sri Lanka's capital city. With its stunning ocean views, upscale amenities, and central location, it is an ideal choice for business and leisure travelers alike. Whether you're enjoying a meal at one of the hotel’s restaurants, relaxing by the infinity pool, or exploring the vibrant city of Colombo, The Kingsbury ensures a memorable stay filled with luxury and hospitality.

name: Taj Samudra, Colombo
details: Taj Samudra Colombo is a luxury 5-star hotel located in the heart of Colombo, overlooking the Indian Ocean. Set within 11 acres of beautifully landscaped gardens, it offers a blend of modern comforts and traditional hospitality. The hotel features 274 rooms and 26 suites, many of which offer panoramic ocean views. Guests can enjoy amenities such as marble bathrooms, luxury toiletries, and 24-hour room service. The Taj Samudra is also known for its excellent dining options, which include six restaurants serving a range of cuisines. From the Indian flavors at Navratna to Japanese dishes at YUMI, and seafood specialties at The Crab Factory, there is something to suit all palates. Additionally, the hotel offers a fitness center, an outdoor swimming pool, and wellness treatments, including massages and beauty services.

rooms.description: The hotel is convenient for both business and leisure travelers, offering proximity to major landmarks in Colombo. For business events, it has a 24-hour business center, modern conference rooms, and banquet facilities. Other features include free Wi-Fi, free parking, concierge services, and a range of entertainment options such as live music, tennis, and themed dinners.

name: Cinnamon Red Colombo
details: Cinnamon Red Colombo is a sleek and modern hotel in Colombo's Bambalapitiya district, ideal for both business and leisure travelers. The hotel is eco-certified and offers a range of amenities, including a rooftop infinity pool with stunning views of the city and the Indian Ocean. There's also a rooftop bar, Cloud Red, that provides cocktails and tapas with a lively social atmosphere.

rooms.description: The hotel's dining options include Flavoured, a casual restaurant offering fusion cuisine, and Stirred, a 24/7 lobby bar. Guests can also enjoy a gym, free Wi-Fi, and a business center. Rooms are stylishly furnished with modern comforts like premium bedding, hypoallergenic options, and 40-inch LED TVs. The hotel is near popular attractions such as the Gangaramaya Temple and Liberty Plaza, making it a convenient stay for exploring Colombo.

name: Cinnamon Lakeside Hotel
details: Cinnamon Lakeside Colombo is a popular 5-star hotel situated along the banks of Beira Lake in the heart of Colombo. It is known for its luxurious atmosphere, exceptional dining options, and range of leisure activities. The hotel offers a variety of rooms and suites, including family-friendly options and bridal suites, equipped with modern amenities like air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, minibars, and private balconies. Guests also have access to allergy-free rooms and interconnected rooms.

rooms.description: Cinnamon Lakeside features six on-site restaurants offering diverse cuisines, such as Royal Thai for Thai dishes, Long Feng for Chinese cuisine, and Sushi Bar. The hotel also boasts a pool, a wellness spa, tennis courts, and a gym, ensuring a comfortable and activity-filled stay. For nightlife and entertainment, the property offers a floating lounge and a nightclub. It’s conveniently located just 0.3 miles from several top attractions like Bally's Casino and Sri Murugan Temple, making it a good base for exploring Colombo.

name: The Golden Crown
details: The Golden Crown Hotel is a premier 5-star luxury hotel located in the tranquil hills of Ampitiya, Kandy, offering a perfect blend of modern sophistication and traditional Sri Lankan charm. Known for its serene ambiance and elegant architecture, this hotel is ideal for both leisure and business travelers seeking a high-end experience while being close to Kandy’s cultural landmarks. Situated about 10 minutes from Kandy’s city center, in a peaceful area called Ampitiya.

rooms.description: Concierge Services: 24-hour assistance for tour arrangements, restaurant reservations, and transport services. Free Wi-Fi: Complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the property. Valet Parking: Available for guests with private vehicles. Airport Transfers: Private transfers to and from Bandaranaike International Airport can be arranged upon request. The Golden Crown Hotel offers a range of luxurious rooms and suites, each designed with comfort and style in mind. All rooms provide scenic views of either the surrounding hills, the lush gardens, or the hotel's swimming pool.

name: Jetwing by Galle Heritage Villa
details: Galle Heritage Villa is a beautiful boutique hotel located in the historic city of Galle, Sri Lanka. It’s known for its charming architecture, combining colonial influences with modern comforts. Historical Ambiance: The villa often showcases original features such as high ceilings, wooden floors, and intricate decor, reflecting Galle's rich history. Comfortable Accommodations: Rooms typically include air conditioning, en-suite bathrooms, and charming furnishings, providing a cozy and inviting atmosphere. Outdoor Spaces: Many guests enjoy the lush gardens and tranquil courtyard areas, perfect for relaxing or enjoying breakfast.

rooms.description: At the hotel, each room is fitted with a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at GALLE HERITAGE VILLA also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms come with a balcony. Guest rooms at the accommodation include air conditioning and a desk. At Villa Heritage in Galle, the rooms typically offer a blend of colonial charm and modern comfort

name: Radisson Blu Resort Galle
details: Radisson Blu Resort, Galle is a 5-star beachfront luxury resort located on the southwestern coast of Sri Lanka, just a few kilometers from the historic Galle Fort. Known for its modern design, exceptional service, and direct access to the beach, it offers a serene getaway for both leisure and business travelers. Situated just a short drive from the UNESCO World Heritage Site Galle Fort, the hotel offers easy access to local attractions, beaches, and cultural landmarks. It is also near popular coastal destinations like Unawatuna Beach and Hikkaduwa for snorkeling, diving, and surfing.

rooms.description: Radisson Blu Resort, Galle offers a blend of contemporary luxury, stunning ocean views, and excellent service. With its wide range of amenities, from gourmet dining to spa treatments and beach activities, it's an ideal destination for families, couples, and business travelers looking for a relaxing yet enriching stay in Sri Lanka.

name: Madulkelle Tea and Eco Lodge
details: Madulkelle Tea and Eco Lodge is an eco-friendly luxury retreat nestled in the lush Knuckles Mountain Range of Sri Lanka. It offers guests a unique experience of staying in sustainable tented lodges surrounded by tea plantations, dense forests, and stunning mountain views. The lodge combines comfort, nature, and adventure, making it an ideal destination for eco-conscious travelers, nature lovers, and those looking for a serene escape in the heart of Sri Lanka's highlands. Situated on the Knuckles Mountain Range, a UNESCO World Heritage site, the lodge is about 30 km from Kandy. The lodge offers breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains, forests, and tea plantations.

rooms.description: Each tented lodge is elevated on stilts, with canvas walls and wooden floors. The lodges feature modern amenities but maintain a close connection to nature, with large private verandas that offer panoramic views. Comfortable king-size or twin beds with premium bedding En-suite bathroom with hot water, rain showers, and eco-friendly toiletries Private terrace or balcony with outdoor seating Solar-powered lighting and minimal use of electricity to reduce environmental impact Complimentary tea and coffee-making facilities with a selection of local tea. Madulkelle Tea and Eco Lodge is a perfect blend of luxury, adventure, and sustainability, offering guests a chance to disconnect from modern life while immersing themselves in nature. With breathtaking views, eco-conscious practices, and a range of activities that cater to both relaxation and adventure, it provides an unforgettable experience for travelers seeking a peaceful retreat in the heart of Sri Lanka’s highlands.

name: Suisse Hotel Kandy
details: Suisse Hotel Kandy is a charming colonial-style hotel located in the heart of Kandy, Sri Lanka. Known for its old-world charm, historic significance, and picturesque location by the Kandy Lake, the hotel offers a blend of traditional elegance and modern comfort. It’s a great choice for travelers who wish to experience Kandy’s rich cultural heritage while enjoying convenient access to the city's attractions. Suisse Hotel Kandy is ideal for travelers seeking an authentic and historical experience in Sri Lanka’s cultural capital. Its colonial charm, combined with a scenic location by Kandy Lake, makes it a great choice for those who appreciate history, nature, and comfort. The hotel’s proximity to major attractions, along with its beautiful gardens and traditional hospitality, ensures a relaxing and memorable stay in Kandy.

The estate is an exclusive and serene retreat that combines modern luxury with the charm of a colonial tea estate. It offers stunning views of the surrounding mountains and lush greenery, providing an ideal setting for relaxation, privacy, and immersion in nature.

rooms.description: The rooms and suites at W15 Hanthana Estate are spacious and elegantly designed with a mix of antique furniture and modern amenities. Each room is individually styled and features high ceilings, large windows, and private balconies or verandas. King-size or twin beds with premium bedding, En-suite bathrooms with rain showers and bathtubs, Air conditioning and ceiling fans, Flat-screen TVs, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth speakers. Tea and coffee-making facilities with a selection of local teas Personalized butler service for a tailored experience. W15 Hanthana Estate is a luxurious, peaceful, and eco-conscious retreat set in one of Sri Lanka’s most beautiful mountain regions. Its perfect blend of colonial elegance, modern comfort, and natural beauty makes it an ideal destination for travelers seeking a unique and serene getaway.

name: W15 Ahangama Escape
details: W15 Ahangama Escape is a luxury boutique hotel located in the serene coastal town of Ahangama, on Sri Lanka’s southern coast. Known for its peaceful setting, lush surroundings, and proximity to some of the best surf spots in the region, W15 Ahangama Escape offers a perfect retreat for those seeking relaxation, surfing, and upscale amenities. W15 Ahangama Escape is nestled in a tranquil spot on Sri Lanka’s southern coast, surrounded by lush vegetation and offering direct access to the beach. It’s an ideal spot for those looking to escape the crowds and enjoy the natural beauty of the area.

rooms.description: W15 Ahangama Escape offers luxurious, private villas and suites designed to blend seamlessly with the natural surroundings. The architecture features a combination of modern design with rustic elements to create an elegant, laid-back vibe. The hotel offers a variety of luxury suites and villas, including garden view rooms and oceanfront villas. These accommodations are spacious, offering privacy and tranquility, with modern amenities and stylish interiors. W15 Ahangama Escape boasts a beautiful infinity pool, offering panoramic views of the ocean. The pool area is surrounded by sun loungers and lush greenery, creating a relaxing environment for guests to unwind. W15 Ahangama Escape offers a luxurious yet tranquil experience for guests looking to relax by the beach, surf the famous waves of Ahangama, or explore the southern coast of Sri Lanka.

name: Hotel J
details: Hotel J Unawatuna is a charming beachfront hotel located in Unawatuna, a popular coastal town in Sri Lanka, known for its stunning beaches and vibrant marine life. Hotel J offers a blend of comfort and relaxation, making it an ideal destination for travelers seeking a laid-back beach holiday. Hotel J is situated right on Unawatuna Beach, offering guests easy access to the golden sands and clear waters of the Indian Ocean. The hotel is conveniently located near popular attractions, including the historic Galle Fort, Japanese Peace Pagoda, and various diving spots.

rooms.description: The hotel features a variety of comfortable rooms designed with a mix of modern and traditional Sri Lankan décor. Options include Standard Rooms, Deluxe Rooms, and Family Rooms. Some rooms offer stunning ocean views or direct access to the beach. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, a minibar, tea/coffee-making facilities, and an en-suite bathroom with hot water. Hotel J features a spacious outdoor swimming pool, surrounded by sun loungers and tropical landscaping, providing a perfect place to relax and unwind. Hotel J Unawatuna provides a relaxing beachside escape with comfortable accommodations and a variety of amenities. Its prime location on Unawatuna Beach, combined with a range of activities and dining options, makes it an attractive destination for families, couples, and solo travelers alike.

name: Kottukal Beach House by Jetwing
details: Kottukal Beach House by Jetwing is a charming and intimate boutique hotel located on the pristine beaches of Kottukal, along the southwestern coast of Sri Lanka. Surrounded by lush tropical gardens and offering direct access to the beach, this property provides a perfect blend of natural beauty, comfort, and personalized service. It is ideal for travelers seeking a tranquil getaway by the sea, away from the hustle and bustle of larger resorts.

rooms.description: The hotel is located right on the sandy shores of Kottukal Beach, providing stunning views of the Indian Ocean and easy access to the beach. Kottukal Beach House offers a variety of accommodations, including Deluxe Rooms, Superior Rooms, and Family Rooms. Each room is designed for comfort and relaxation, featuring modern decor with a touch of local charm.

name: Jetwing Mahesa Bhawan
details: Jetwing Mahesa Bhawan is a serene and luxurious hotel located in Anuradhapura, Sri Lanka, set amidst beautiful gardens and rich historical surroundings. This property is known for its focus on sustainability, local culture, and the traditional Sri Lankan way of life, making it an ideal retreat for travelers looking to explore the ancient city of Anuradhapura while enjoying modern comforts. Situated near historical sites, including the Sacred City of Anuradhapura, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, allowing guests to explore ancient temples, stupas, and other cultural landmarks. The hotel is set in a peaceful environment surrounded by nature, offering a tranquil escape.

rooms.description: The hotel features a range of accommodations, including Deluxe Rooms and Suites. The hotel has a restaurant that offers a diverse menu featuring local and international cuisine, emphasizing fresh, locally sourced ingredients and traditional Sri Lankan flavors. Jetwing Mahesa Bhawan provides a unique blend of luxury and cultural immersion in the heart of Anuradhapura. With its modern amenities, excellent dining options, and easy access to historical sites, guests can enjoy a relaxing stay while exploring the rich heritage of one of Sri Lanka’s ancient cities. Whether lounging by the pool, indulging in local cuisine, or discovering the area's history, visitors will find a welcoming and enriching experience at Jetwing Mahesa Bhawan.

name: Cinnamon Lodge Habarana
details: Cinnamon Lodge Habarana is a luxurious eco-friendly resort located in Habarana, in the heart of Sri Lanka’s Cultural Triangle. Surrounded by lush greenery, the hotel offers a serene escape for nature lovers and is an excellent base for exploring nearby historical sites like Sigiriya, Dambulla, and Polonnaruwa. The resort emphasizes sustainability and blends luxury with a commitment to preserving the environment.

rooms.description: Cinnamon Lodge Habarana is an eco-luxury retreat that provides guests with an immersive experience of Sri Lanka's rich natural beauty and cultural heritage. With its luxurious accommodations, excellent dining options, and close proximity to the island’s most iconic historical sites, it is the perfect destination for both leisure and adventure travelers. Whether you're exploring the Cultural Triangle, going on a safari, or simply relaxing by the pool, Cinnamon Lodge offers an unforgettable stay surrounded by nature.

name: Lavendish Wild Safari
details: Lavendish Wild is set amidst the lush expanses of Wasgamuwa overlooking the majestic Knuckles Mountain Range and Dunuwila Wewa. 27-star classrooms, a restaurant and pool sit in perfect unison on 3.5 acres of beautifully landscaped garden. The hotel is a haven for the wildlife enthusiast and a gateway to a number of breath-taking attractions in the surrounding area.

rooms.description: Dip your toes into crystal clear waters in our hotel-centered pool and enjoy the calm serenity of nature under the shade of lush green trees. Enjoy an evening drink at the lounge bar or have a bit of fun with our pool table.

name: Lavendish Wild Wilpattu
details: Immersed in nature, Wild Wilpattu hosts a selection of deluxe rooms that surrounds a peaceful paddy field. Within close proximity to Wilpattu National Park and hosting an array of excursions, the hotel stands as the ideal holiday escape.

rooms.description: Enjoy your next gateway right at your fingertips via website. Your Booking through our official website is fast, seamless and secure. Click on the link below to make your booking today.

name: Lavendish Country Resort
details: Finding an ideal small hotel in Dambulla does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Lavendish Country Resort, a nice option for travelers like you. Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Lavendish Country Resort makes getting online easy as free wifi is available. You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the small hotel, including room service. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant during their visit.

rooms.description: Dip your toes into crystal clear waters in our hotel-centered pool and enjoy the calm serenity of nature under the shade of lush green trees. Enjoy an evening drink or have a bit of fun with our pool table. The world’s largest rock cave temple, at Dambulla, is one of Sri Lanka’s most important religious sites. Its Buddha-filled interior is a highlight; it’s an experience you won't want to miss.

name: Lavendish Okrin Kataragama
details: Nested in the lower southern corner of the island, bordering ‘Wedihiti Kanda’ and ‘Detagamuwa Tank,’ Lavendish OKRIN has a very unique view of the environment and surroundings. For several years now, Lavendish Okrin Kataragama has been ranked number 2 by ‘Trip Advisor’ in hotels within Kataragama and has been awarded the Trip Advisor Certificate of Excellence on multiple occasions.

rooms.description: Open for both adults and supervised kids, take a swim in our pool and experience some refreshing drinks at our bar which also holds a lounge and pool table. With selections from both Sri Lankan and Western cuisines, kick start your morning with a delicious, wholesome cooked-to-order breakfast from our full-service restaurant. Or step outside to enjoy some high tea in our garden and pool area, with Kataragama Lake in the distance.

name: Jaffna Heritage Hotel
details: Jaffna Heritage is not just about just a hotel. We are always attentive about your holiday and try our hardest to make it memorable. Our friendly staff always care for you with all high standards. We provide you with the best authentic healthier cuisine experiences that make you have again.

rooms.description: Jaffna Heritage Hotel is just 601 m away from Nallur Kandaswamy Temple in Jaffna. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this 4-star hotel has a garden, a terrace and free private parking. The accommodations include free WiFi, an outdoor swimming pool, room service, a shared lounge and a restaurant. The hotel provides you with the facility of currency exchange for guests.
